entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
